text: What's going on in the picture? Well, the guy's getting in the, the boy's getting in the cookie jar and he's standing on a stool that is falling over and his . sister maybe is telling him to be quiet so his mother won't see him. In the meantime, the . sink is running over onto the floor and she's drying dishes. And .. there's something going on outside the window. I don't know what it is. . She's drying dishes, but I don't get the connection between the picture outside. I guess she's having her problems and they're having theirs. Okay. .. Okay.
